definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
see 作戰失蹤人員|作战失踪人员[zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2]

pinyin: zuo4 zhan4 shi1 zong1 ren2 yuan2

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大战与地面常规作战之间有着密切的联系。

sentences.english: In former times, people used to fight with swords.
sentences.chinese: 过去，人们惯常用刀剑作战。

sentences.english: One day at the end of yr2003, I have even interpreted for 10 hours successfully.
sentences.chinese: 我，作为翻译也连续作战了10个小时。

sentences.english: The corporal was cited for bravery in battle.
sentences.chinese: 那位下士因作战英勇而受到嘉奖。

sentences.english: Recruited by Polish generals for their speed, and ferocity , Polish archers are armed with a bow and a sword.
sentences.chinese: 由于他们作战骁勇，来去如风，被波兰将领招至军中。

sentences.english: Clay warehouse near 11 o clock at night, Sun Weijun decorate plan.
sentences.chinese: 夜里11点红土仓库附近，孙维君布置作战计划。

sentences.english: Larger 10)amphibious assault forces attack beaches head on in massed formations.
sentences.chinese: 大型的两栖作战部队以大规模编队正面进攻海滩。

sentences.english: In the background are the battleships of the U.S. fleet that made up the invasion task force. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 图片背景是执行入侵作战任务的美舰队的战舰。

sentences.english: The nature of modern war is highly distributed coordination.
sentences.chinese: 现代战争的特点是高度的分布式协同作战。

sentences.english: He was part of the battalion's planning team, but he hoped to finish the tour as a front-line company commander.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名营级指挥官，但他想要去前线亲自指挥作战。

sentences.english: He joined the underground to fight against the fascists.
sentences.chinese: 他参加了地下组织与法西斯作战。

sentences.english: If any "Fulcrums" saw combat, their numbers were extremely small.
sentences.chinese: 如果有任何“支点”看到作战，他们的人数极少。

sentences.english: The relability of information is the life line of future successful information war.
sentences.chinese: 信息的可信度是未来遂行信息化作战的生命线。

sentences.english: "I hear the two o' you are going to fight for us, " the serjeant said.
sentences.chinese: “我听说你们两个也准备为我们作战，”高级律师说。

sentences.english: The admiral manoeuvred his ships in the battle plan.
sentences.chinese: 舰队司令按作战计划进行舰队演习。

sentences.english: It is important to evaluate the combat efficiency of C4ISR system.
sentences.chinese: 对指挥自动化系统进行作战效能评估具有重大意义。

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
